## difference() function

Returns a new array with elements which is contained in 'array' and is not contained in `other`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function difference<T>(array: readonly T[], ...others: readonly T[][]): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | readonly T\[\] | The target array |
|  others | readonly T\[\]\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

T\[\]

A new array

## Example


```typescript
Arubyray.difference([0, 1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 4], [1, 3], [3, 4]) // => [0, 2, 2]

```
